Judul: CCS TECHNOLOGIE POST COMBUSTION (AMONIAKOV�������� METODA) PRO NADKRITICK�������� BLOK 660 MWe
Abstrak: This thesis deal with the possibility of using Post-combustion CCS technology in the Czech Republic. The thesis is focused on the integration of this technology for the steam cycle power plant. The main types of CCS technologies are introduced. Technical and economic analysis of steam power plant with Post-combustion CCS technology is presented. Potential of using Post-combustion CCS technology in the Czech Republic is assessed.
